Examples¶

Ideal diode solar cell¶

The most self-contained example, in Jupyter notebook form. To run:

  • Download the Github repository and run from your local machine using Jupyter

OR

  • Run in the cloud using Binder!

Kinematics¶

Probably the simplest example, explained on the Technical Background page. It exists in the Github repo under examples/kinematics/kinetmatics.py and you can run it all in one go from a Terminal or step-by-step in an IDE like Spyder.

Tin Sulfide (SnS) solar cell¶

redoing fit from Joule paper
